programme.title: Uncontrollably Fond
programme.desc: It's a love story of a man and woman who meet again after they broke up in the past. The man, in the presence of his death, wishes to make amends. Their romance will have you seek comfort and hope in love.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: A talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman" , the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible 2
programme.desc: The training academy from Dogs Are Incredible! For pet owners struggling with issues like biting, aggression, or excessive barking from their beloved dogs who've become part of the family. Experts from various fields provide customized training methods and tailored advice — helping unruly dogs transform into well-behaved companions!

programme.title: You Are The Best!
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest, most deeply touching word in the world? "Mom!" Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika’s mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn…

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.desc: Frankie leaves foster care to attend an exclusive Swiss boarding school. Turns out, the opportunity comes at a deadly price when a classmate is murdered and everyone is quick to blame Frankie.

programme.title: The Daughter I Gave Away
programme.desc: Fifteen years after a teenage girl places her baby up for adoption, she learns that her daughter has gone missing from the adoptive parent's home. In her search for answers, she uncovers a chilling truth.

programme.desc: This action movie tackles the issue of labor union. Starring Rudy Fernandez as Leon delos Reyes.

programme.title: Roberta
programme.desc: Child actress Mumay Santiago gets her biggest break as she portrayed the title role in this remake of the Sampaguita Pictures' classic from the 50's. Roberta is a little girl forced to learn how to fend for herself because of her abusive and irresponsible father and ailing mother. When her mother died, Roberta is forced to live on the streets of the city where despite her many hardships, she managed to maintain a sunny disposition that enchants even strangers.

programme.title: Huwag Mong Isuko Ang Laban
programme.desc: Ex-convict David was working as a cab driver when he came across an attache case filled with money and important papers. He returned this to the owner, who took pity on him and hired him as a driver for his daughter, Cheska.

programme.title: Oscar Ramos, Hitman
programme.desc: Oscar Ramos (Ramon Revilla) is a respected man in the community. He settles disputes and takes up the cudgels for the oppressed. He also has a secret -- an amulet that protects him from bullets. Will his amulet protect him when both the police and Ka Ernie's group hunt him down?

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Gagay, Prinsesa Ng Brownout
programme.desc: This is the Cinderella story for the brown-out plagued generation of this country. Gagay and her family gathered wood which they made into coal. Though they were poor, they already saw some improvement in their lives.

programme.title: Alabok Sa Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Winston is smitten with Eva's beauty and decides to pursue her without knowing that Dom is secretly in love with her. But for how long will Dom be able to conceal the love that he is keeping deep inside of him?

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: A failed romance in the past between her mother and his father threatened the budding relationship between Sharon and Gabby, in this film, which was the very first movie produced by Viva Films.

programme.title: J-MELO

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-10.

programme.title: Corners of the Earth: Kamchatka
programme.desc: Filmmakers and surfers voyage to Russia's Kamchatka peninsula. Utilizing helicopters and snowmobiles they explore remote volcanic coastline in pursuit of undiscovered waves along icy shores.

programme.title: Iconic Australia - The Rebels
programme.desc: When you look back through Australia's history, social progress is almost always marked by the rebellious behaviour of larrikin Aussies who, through their charisma, authenticity and passionate determination created change.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali - Episode 10
programme.desc: Indulge in Lauren's exploration of the chocolate world as she uncovers its unique characteristics. From savory chocolate salsa to raw vegan cake, her mix of recipes leaves a lasting appreciation for this beloved ingredient.

programme.title: The Streets with Dan Hong - Episode 2
programme.desc: Dan Hong sets out to unearth iconic national street food dishes, tracing them back to their roots and then preparing them himself.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 40
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 41
programme.desc: Five days out from the First Ashes Test in Perth, Abbey Gelmi and the panel bring you the latest ahead of the much-anticipated series between Australia and England, plus AFLW Semi Finals, the WBBL, A Leagues, NBL and WNBL.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - End Of Year Special
programme.desc: It's the season finale of That Pacific Sports Show! Tiana Penitani Gray, Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tinirau Arona wrap up 2025 with highlights, special guests, and powerful Pasifika performances. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 229
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 229
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 229
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 1
programme.desc: Derek starts his journey on the hunt for some duck, to help make an olive tapenade, head out on sea to collect ocean grown farmed abalone and even finds time to shake a leg with a local Noongar kids' dance group.

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 6
programme.desc: Thanh sets his focus on another classically Mediterranean vegetable - the artichoke. Along the way he follows the artichoke through Melbourne's largest wholesale produce market and into a local Italian kitchen.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces - Outback Chefs
programme.desc: The gourmet chefs turned station cooks. In 2018 two retired chefs fulfilled their dream to cook for the hungry crew of an outback cattle station. But for staff used to plain food, there were a few changes needed to the menu.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s - Master Blasters
programme.desc: You can't win a cricket match without scoring a lot of runs, and a special breed of batsmen that did this better than anybody else. Richards, Gower, Haynes, Crowe, Miandad and Gavaskar were the legendary '80s master blasters.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Tivey Manor
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a big city couple aiming to bring a slouching country town mansion back to the burnished glory of its gold rush years.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 211
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 211
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Fancy Fruit - Plenty of Persimmons

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 321
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.desc: The magnificent rock that is Uluru is an icon of Australia - remote, untamed, and mysterious. However, as Aaron Pedersen explains, the Red Centre with its arid deserts hold much more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Savannah and Trent Paschal seem like the perfect suburban couple — madly in love. But when Savannah finds her calling as a funeral director, their romance ends in suspicion, and a countrywide police hunt.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: A tragic car crash leads to the death of an 89-year-old woman. Her daughter, who was behind the wheel, is blamed for her death and faces a life behind bars. Carless driver or devastated crash survivor?

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: A heated argument turns terrifying as a woman is threatened by her boyfriend. Waiting at a gas station after calling 911, she grabs a machete to defend herself.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: The town of Alexandria, Louisiana, is rocked when the body of Courtney Coco, 19, is found dumped 200 miles from home in Winnie, Texas.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)

programme.desc: Undercover ATF and DEA agents are reminded to never judge a book by its cover and to always be on their toes. Even small-time suspects have the potential to unleash terror.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 6
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Afterlife ep 5
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 4
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 9
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 8
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Carpool ep 2
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Barrio Kulimlim ep 2
programme.desc: Family and fate intertwine in this dark story of old rituals and a parallel shadow universe where sacrifices of blood ensures that the small town of Quatro Santo remains wealthy and prosperous. A mother and daughter with old ties return to the place where their ancestors once tried to flee, only to find themselves trying to escape a darker destiny.
